au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka2.experiment.mo.name: L1=L2=14m_central_apx10
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka2.experiment.mo.initScript: # Drive attenuator to safe value driveAtt(330) #sics.drive('nvs_lambda', 5.0) # Drive detector to short position sics.set('/instrument/detector/detector_y/speed', 53) driveDet(13200,0) # Drive guide to g2 config driveGuide(guideConfig.g2) # Drive entrance aperture to 180 (for g2) driveEntRotAp(180) #set sample ap to 10 mm sics.drive('apx', -72) # Drive beamstops up selBs(1) sics.set('beamcenterx', 97.6) sics.set('beamcenterz', 95.3)
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka2.experiment.mo.preTransmissionScript: # Move the beamstop out driveBsx(31, 100) # Drive attenuator to 240 driveAtt(240)
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka2.experiment.mo.preScatteringScript: # Drive attenuator to safe value driveAtt(330) # Move the beamstop in driveBsx(31, 0) driveBsz(256.0)
